releaseNotes: New update, same good vibes. We kicked bugs out of the party and made the app run smoother than ever. Update now and see for yourself!
description:
Meet Smitten, the most fun dating app in the world.
Dating shouldn’t feel like a job.
Convos shouldn’t be scripted.
Laughter shouldn’t be forced.
Smitten fixes this.

We bring the sparks, the fun, and the personality back to dating: through playful profile moments, DUO dates, new ways to explore potential matches, and people who get your kind of energy.

“We’re not like other dating apps!”

Here’s why...

1. Instantly find your kind of match.
In fact, you’re not even searching for your date. You’re just listing out what you want in your date, and our interactive date search helps you find them fast.
For example:
• “Tall, dark, handsome, and brown eyes.”
• “6ft, blue eyes, finance bro, trust fund energy”
• “Blonde, outdoorsy, likes coffee.”
2. Our unique content feed.
Explore profiles and peel back the layers of their personality: their quirks, humor, highlights, spicy takes, and bold opinions. Finally experience the “OMG I actually like this person?!” magic.
3. Go on DUO dates with your partner in crime.
Drag your best friend along. Match with other Duos. Choose a Duo activity to do with your dates. And if the date flops, you’ll both have a shoulder to cry on. Friendship goals 101.
4. Really get to know people.
Smitten profiles are filled with personality games, fun facts (like whether they believe in love at first sight), and live photo moments that tell the unfiltered story of your match.
5. Dry chats? Never met her.
Matches expire after 10 days if no one messages. Bye ghosting. Bye random 3-month-later “hey, wanna grab coffee?” Smitten automatically drops game results into the chat so the convo starts itself.

What if dating became as easy as playing a game?

Guessary tells you stuff only their parents know.
Guess fun facts about other people and discover the unexpected personality behind that picture-perfect smile. Perfect icebreaker. Zero effort.

Lie Detector... explanation needed?
Two truths and a lie: you know the drill. Find the lie. Call their bluff. Start the conversation.

Explore their crazy with Wavy.
Rate hot takes on a slider, then guess theirs. See if you click or if you’ll debate pineapple on pizza forever.

Unlock Smitten Premium,
the ultimate cheat code for dating.
• See your likes: Secret admirers? Not so secret anymore.
• Undo your likes: For the times you get too carried away.
• Unlimited likes: What fun is there if you can’t mingle freely?
• Read receipts: See when your messages are read.
• Go incognito: Stay hidden from your snitchy coworkers. Only people you like can see you.

It’s a ruckus out there!
We set up a few safety nets to keep your head on:
• Pause profile anytime: Jump back in whenever you’re ready.

Just a final word of advice: don’t be on a dating app... unless it’s Smitten.

---
The app is free to use. Optional premium features available. Terms apply:
https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/d4cOtUMF
